content.rendered:
Canvas Seat Covers

At Gotya covered we manufacture heavy duty canvas seat covers to fit a wide variety of vehicles. Our Australian made covers are custom made and custom fit for your vehicle. We have an extensive range that are available for 4×4 models, commercial, mining and agricultural machines.

Our canvas range is available in either a 14.9oz standard canvas or a heavy duty ripstop canvas. Both variants are a medium weight polyester/cotton canvas suitable for use in cars and for truck seat covers. They are the perfect fabric to match the tough Australian conditions.

Our ripstop canvas features the added strength of two-way ripstop running through the fabric to prevent any tears. They are an ideal fabric for use in tough industrial conditions such as mining and commercial environments.

Our premium canvas range are tailor made to fit your vehicle and as a result they do not wrinkle and look great when fitted. They offer premium protection for your seats and are still comfortable to sit on. Whether it’s everyday drink spills, sand from the beach or dirt, you can be assured that our canvas seat covers will protect your seats.

See below for some images of our canvas seat covers fitted to a range of vehicles including the Holden Colorado, Hyundai iLoad and Mitsubishi Pajero Sport. Our extensive range also includes Ford, Isuzu, Mazda, Toyota and other popular 4WD makes and models on the market today.

Key features of our canvas seat covers

Key features of our canvas seat cover range include:

  • Water and rot resistant.
  • Heavy duty protection for your seats.
  • Air bag certified.
  • Easy to fit.
  • Tailor fit giving a great look.
  • Available in Ripstop canvas for extra protection.
  • Available in a range of colours.
  • Custom embroidery available on request.

Using our high quality canvas seat covers will help protect your original interior and prolong the life of your seats. They are a great investment for any vehicle. Like our complete seat cover range they are made from Australian made fabrics and are air bag certified. When it comes to seat covers we have gotya covered.

Denim Seat Covers

Our denim seat covers are manufactured from a specifically designed high quality cotton twill fabric. They have a 5mm high density foam backing which ensures comfort and durability. They are a fantastic investment to protect your original seats.

Our denim seat covers are great in that they are both hard wearing, and very comfortable to sit on. The plush foam backing ensures a high level of comfort, and also features a fine layer of mesh which prevents the covers rubbing against your seats. Perfect if your car is fitted with leather seats.

Our denim range is ideal for everyday use or for the 4×4 hobbyist. Whether it’s a trip to the beach with the kids or a fishing trip, they will protect your seats from sand, dirt, mud and everyday grime. Although not as tough as our canvas range, they can still be used in tougher environments, providing protection for seats fitted in commercial vehicles, mining machines and equipment.

Finished with a tailored snug fit, they give your vehicle a clean professional look and look fantastic in either a black or light grey finish. See below for some images of our denim covers fitted to a Nissan Navara STX, Jeep Grand Cherokee and Ford F250.

Key Features of our denim seat covers

Available in light grey, charcoal grey or black colour options.

Key features of our denim seat cover range include:

  • Plush foam backing for comfort.
  • Water resistant.
  • UV protective coating.
  • Air bag certified.
  • Clean professional look.
  • Suitable for vehicles fitted with leather seats

Foam Canvas Seat Covers

Want the best protection for your seats without any sacrifice in comfort?

Our premium foam backed canvas range has got you covered. It combines the best protective features of our heavy duty canvas, along with the comfort of the foam backing used on our denim covers. Comfort, ultimate seat protection and they look fantastic.

Key Features

  • Heavy duty protection for your seats.
  • Waterproof.
  • 5mm Plush foam backing allows for a tailor fit and extra comfort.
  • Hard wearing canvas is suitable for the toughest Australian conditions.
  • Suitable for vehicles fitted with leather seats.

Camouflage Canvas Seat Covers

Our Camo canvas comes with all of the benefits of our standard canvas but with a camouflage finish.

Available in Green, Grey, Pink or Blue colour options it really does complete the look of your vehicle.

Set your vehicle apart with a set of our camo covers today!

Ripstop Canvas Seat Covers

Our heavy duty 14oz ripstop canvas has added two way ripstop for added strength. It is fire retardent and therefore suitable for use on mining vehicles or vehicles used on mining sites.

Key Features

  • Australian made 14oz canvas.
  • Waterproof.
  • Fire retardent.
  • Rot resistant.
  • Heavy duty protection for your seats.
  • Mining Spec.

excerpt.rendered:
Manufactured from different materials for a wide range of vehicles.

Please request a quote for YOUR CAR
Please let us know the specification of your car in the format

        Make    Model           Series  Specification   Year
e.g.    Toyota  Landcruiser     300     GX              12/2021

… and the kind of cover you are after

e.g. Front Seats, 2nd Row, 3rd Row, … , All Rows
